author: hboutemy
msg: added a redirection for images when in *-archives: useful for archives sites of multi-module components, since relative links are wrong (ex: /maven-release-archives/maven-release-2.4/ calculates relative links like if it was at /maven-release/): known limitation of actual -archives pattern done to reduce extpaths.txt content
notice: this problem does not exist for /plugins, /shared, /pom, /skins
